title: James Montalbano
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055704/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055704/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : James Montalbano**

James Montalbano is founder of Brooklyn-based type studio [Terminal Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055704/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Terminal%20Design).

URL: [http://www.terminaldesign.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20140809055704/http:/www.terminaldesign.com/ "http://www.terminaldesign.com")
author: Joe Pemberton
